tool_description: Optimizes product prices using demand forecasts, competitor data, inventory levels, and profit objectives to find optimal pricing.

current_price.description: Current selling price of the product

demand_forecast.description: Forecasted demand at different price points

competitor_prices.description: Current competitor prices for similar products

optimization_objective.description: Optimization goal: maximize_profit, maximize_revenue, maximize_market_share, clear_inventory

max_price_change_percent.description: Maximum allowed price change from current price

competitive_positioning.description: Desired market position: premium, neutral, discount

error_messages: Invalid current price: current_price must be positive number
Empty demand forecast: demand_forecast must contain at least 3 data points
Invalid optimization objective: use maximize_profit, maximize_revenue, maximize_market_share, or clear_inventory
Cost exceeds price: cost_per_unit cannot be greater than current_price
Invalid margin constraint: min_margin_percent must be between 0 and 100
Invalid price change limit: max_price_change_percent must be positive
Invalid competitive positioning: use premium, neutral, or discount
Insufficient competitor data: competitor_prices must contain at least one price
usage: Provide product details (product_id, current_price, cost_per_unit, inventory_level), market data (demand_forecast, competitor_prices), and optimization_objective. Configure constraints and positioning as needed.

competitive_position.description: Position relative to competitors: above, below, aligned
